decisions.description: ... evaluate if a B2C Commerce CustomerList was provided; do not allow Contact Processing to continue if a CustomerList was not provided.
decisions.name: dec_B2CCustomerListNotProvidedAndThrowError
decisions.label: Throw an Error if No CustomerList Exists?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if we can resolve the Contact record using the identifiers provided.
decisions.name: dec_CanWeResolveThisContact
decisions.label: Was a Contact Resolved?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if the FullName and Media values provided are valid
decisions.name: dec_isContactPIIValid
decisions.label: Are FullName and Media are Valid ?

rules.name: decOut_ContactIDIsValid
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND ((5 AND 6)OR(7 AND 8))
rules.label: Is Valid

decisions.description: ... evaluate if QA Mode is enabled -- and act accordingly.
decisions.name: dec_isQAModeEnabled
decisions.label: Is QA Mode Enabled?

decisions.name: dec_wasContactIDSet

decisions.name: decout_Was_a_B2C_CustomerNo_set

decisions.name: Is_FullName_valid

decisions.label: should it be sent to R360 ?

rules.label: No it's an Account login for existing contact

decisions.description: ... evaluate if an Account ID was included with the sourceContact definition.
decisions.name: Was_an_AccountId_Set
decisions.label: Was an AccountId Set?

Flow.description: ... this flow is used to execute Contact Processing requests from B2C Commerce -- and create or update a Contact record within the Salesforce Platform. When do so, a Custom input is created and a Mulesoft Flow is Called
Flow.interviewLabel: B2C Commerce: Process: Create Or Update Contact V2 {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2C Commerce: Process: Create Or Update Contact V3

recordLookups.description: ... retrieves the customerList based on the property value included in the Contact Request.
recordLookups.name: rec_GetCustomerListForExistingContact
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the CustomerList

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Contact record by the B2C CustomerID to validate the CustomerList relationship
recordLookups.name: recGet_ContactByB2CCustomerID
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact by B2C Customer ID

recordLookups.description: ... retrieves the customerList based on the property value included in the Contact Request.
recordLookups.name: recGet_creCustomerList
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the CustomerList

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the defaultConfiguration for the current b2c-crm-sync instance.
recordLookups.name: recGet_defaultConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Get the Default Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... identify which b2c-crm-sync configuration profile is being used as the default.
recordLookups.name: recGet_IdentifyDefaultConfiguration
recordLookups.label: Identify the Default Configuration

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Contact record by the AccountId to validate the Binding
recordLookups.name: recGet_retrieveContactBy_AccountID
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact by AccountID

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Contact record by the B2C Customer No to validate the Binding
recordLookups.name: recGet_retrieveContactBy_B2CCustomerNo
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact by B2C Customer No

recordLookups.name: recGet_retrieveContactBy_ContactId
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Contact by Contact Id

subflows.description: ... evaluate the configuration of the specified CustomerList and sourceContact to determine if integration should be enabled.
subflows.name: sub_allowIntegrationHelper_NoContactID
subflows.label: Evaluate Integration Configuration

subflows.description: ... this flow is used to execute Contact Processing requests from B2C Commerce -- and create a Contact record within the Salesforce Platform.
subflows.name: sub_B2C_Create_Contact
subflows.label: B2C Create Contact

subflows.description: ... this flow is used to execute Contact Processing requests from B2C Commerce -- and update a Contact record within the Salesforce Platform.
subflows.name: sub_B2C_Update_Contact
subflows.label: B2C Update Contact

subflows.description: ... Verify the Capture source of the Custom Input sent by the B2CContactProcessFlow, and return a boolean flag to allow the update of Personal info
subflows.name: sub_B2CCommerce_AllowUpdatePII
subflows.label: Allow Update Personal Identifier Information

subflows.description: ... leverage the Contact Resolution Helper to attempt to resolve the sourceContact.
subflows.name: sub_contactResolutionHelper
subflows.label: Attempt to Resolve the Contact

subflows.description: ... use the QA Helper to override the contact being processed with configurable values.
subflows.name: sub_overrideTheContact
subflows.label: Override the Contact

subflows.description: ...use the QA Mode CustomInput to override the custom input being processed with configurable values
subflows.name: sub_overrideTheCustomInput
subflows.label: Override the Custom Input

variables.description: ... represents the resolved Contact Record via non-ContactID means
variables.name: Contact

variables.description: ... represents the collection containing the Contact to resolve
variables.name: contactToResolve

variables.description: ... represents the input parameters used to process a Contact record.
variables.name: sourceContact

variables.description: ... represents the name applied to the B2C Commerce Account.
variables.name: var_accountName

variables.description: ... variable used to store the B2C CustomerList details that other elements of this flow are dependent on.
variables.name: var_b2cCustomerList

variables.description: ... represents the error message provided by the contactResolutionHelper.
variables.name: var_contactResolutionError

variables.description: ... represents the successFlag value from the contactResolution class.
variables.name: var_contactResolutionSuccess

variables.description: ... represents the iterative count of resolvedContact items
variables.name: var_loopResolvedContactIterationCount

variables.description: ... represents the original version of the sourceContact.
variables.name: var_originalContact

variables.description: ... represents the customerID used to process the Contact within the flow.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerID

variables.description: ... represents the B2C CustomerList ID used to test the B2C Contact Process flow.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerListID

variables.description: ... represents the customerNo the be used to process the Contact within the flow.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerNo

variables.description: ... represents the emailAddress used to test the B2CContactProcess sub-flow.
variables.name: var_qaEmailAddress

variables.description: ... placeholder variable for the contact's lastName.
variables.name: var_qaLastName

variables.description: ... describes if the current flow is operating in QAMode
variables.name: var_qaMode

variables.description: ... represents the contactRecord used to overwrite the sourceContact for QA testing.
variables.name: var_qaSourceContact

variables.description: ... represents the resolvedContact provided by the contactResolutionHelper.
variables.name: var_resolvedContact

variables.description: ... used to capture the number of contacts resolved by the B2C CustomerResolution IA.
variables.name: var_resolvedContactCount
